name: Egyptian Food Bank
description: The Egyptian Food Bank is a non-profit organization that aims to fight hunger and food insecurity in Egypt.

name: Misr El Kheir Foundation
description: Misr El Kheir Foundation is an Egyptian charitable organization that focuses on social development and community welfare projects.

name: Resala Charity Organization
description: Resala is a non-profit organization in Egypt that provides various social services and support to underprivileged individuals and communities.

name: Basma Association
description: Basma Association for Comprehensive Development is an Egyptian NGO that works on community development projects, particularly in health and education.

name: Ezbet Project
description: Ezbet Project is a charitable initiative that focuses on improving living conditions and providing support to residents of informal settlements in Egypt.

name: Egyptian Cancer Society
description: The Egyptian Cancer Society is a non-profit organization dedicated to cancer prevention, treatment, and support services in Egypt.

name: Sawiris Foundation for Social Development
description: Sawiris Foundation for Social Development is an Egyptian NGO that focuses on education, health, and community development projects.

name: Coptic Evangelical Organization for Social Services
description: The Coptic Evangelical Organization for Social Services (CEOSS) is an Egyptian NGO that provides development and relief services to marginalized communities.
